about_the_game:
Embark on an exhilarating escape in Orbis Fractura, a fast-paced sci-fi Breakout-style game where quick reflexes and tactical precision are your best weapons. Trapped inside an imposing enemy ship, you must smash your way through swarms of deadly drones guarding each sector. Your mission is to break through the enemy formations blocking your freedom.

You are equipped with electrically charged, physics-based orbs that obliterate enemy drones on contact. Keep your orbs in play, gather power-ups, and fight your way through 100 levels toward freedom.

With each level, enemy drones become faster, tougher, and more unpredictable. Unlock brand-new arenas, each with its own unique design and atmosphere, plunging you deeper into the heart of the enemy base. Collect power-ups dropped by defeated drones to gain temporary boosts, from explosive weapons to impenetrable shields, giving you the edge you need to survive the relentless onslaught.

  • Classic Arcade Action: A modern reimagining of the iconic Breakout gameplay.

  • Intense Sci-Fi Setting: Battle through hostile 3D arenas filled with enemy drones.

  • Progressive Challenge: Face increasingly difficult drone formations and levels that test your reflexes and tactics.

  • Cultural References and Easter Eggs: Discover hidden surprises and formations inspired by pop culture icons.

  • Arena Variety: Unlock new arenas, each with a unique design and atmosphere.

  • Power-Ups and Weapons: Collect power-ups dropped by defeated drones for temporary boosts, from explosive firepower to defensive shields.

  • High-Octane Soundtrack: Pump up the adrenaline with a powerful electro-metal soundtrack.

  • Skill-Based Gameplay: Fast reflexes and a sharp strategy are key—no two battles are the same. Save your power ups or use them before you loose them. The choice depends on your strategy.

  • Stunning 3D Visuals: Experience a vibrant, futuristic world brought to life with immersive graphics and effects.

Are you ready to take on this pulse-pounding challenge, shatter enemy defenses, and break out of captivity? Victory means survival, and survival is all that matters.

COMING SOON: EARLY 2025

short_description: Orbis Fractura is the next evolution in classic arcade action. Smash through dynamic sci-fi arenas with explosive power-ups, relentless enemy formations, and a pulse-pounding electro-metal soundtrack. Designed for old-school arcade fans, it’s a bold 3D reimagining of Breakout-style gameplay.
